Description: This includes information from high security psychiatric hospitals as well as from other NHS service providers and independent hospitals. Previously produced from the KP90 collection, this yearâ€™s publication is produced using the MHSDS for the third time.
Name: Mental Health Act Statistics, Annual Figures
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by clicking on the link under latest version,  scroll to resources and 2 XLS  spreadsheets are located under resources for the data tables and meta data.  A machine readable CSV document is also available for the data tables under resources.
Sizing Notes: A CSV file is available, some work may be required to determine what dimensions should be called.  May be better suiited to the mental health family.
